ä½œè€…çš„åŸè¯ï¼š
A lightweight plugin created for my server (DireNode, thus the Dire before my plugins) to regulate the ender dragon.Â Â When the ender dragon is killed, a message will be broadcasted to the server saying that it was killed, and by who, and a cooldown which can be set in the config (default to one hour) will start to count down. Once the cooldown reaches 0, any player can say /spawndragon and a new one will appear if they are in the end.Â Â The ender dragon does not drop a portal, and instead the dragon egg and drops are inserted into the killer's inventory directly.

1.1.0 -Fixed bug where it didn't recognize the endÂ Â -End portals don't drop anymore, instead the dragon egg and any extra drops the dragon may have are put directly into the inventory of it's killer
